name: Ryuuguu Rena (Higurashi)
description:
LORA trained on 1041 fanart and official images of Ryuuguu Rena from Higurashi no Naku Koro ni.

Always use ryuuguu_rena trigger keyword.

For Rena's head, use orange hair, blue eyes, tags.

For Rena's school uniform, use school uniform, serafuku, sailor collar, neckerchief, pleated skirt tags.

For Rena's casual outfit, use white dress, beret, purple bow tie, long dress, black thighhighs, high black boots tags.

For cleaver, use weapon, holding weapon, nata (tool) (this can take a lot to generate proper image).

Recommended weight is 1.0. Lower it if you feel that it overwrites your style or other details.

Training and dataset parameters:

  • Images were scraped from gelbooru (NSFW exluded), captions generated with WD tagger;

  • Trained using kohya-ss LORA training GUI, rank 64, resolution 512x768, no regularisation folder, other settings were default;

  • Trained on anything-v4.5-pruned-fp16 model;

  • 7 epoch, 1 step per image.

Images on preview were generated using style LORAs you can find on this site or here https://huggingface.co/closertodeath/ctdlora/tree/main

modelVersions.name: v1
trainedWords: school uniform, serafuku, sailor collar, neckerchief, pleated skirt
white dress, beret, purple bow tie, long dress, black thighhighs, high black boots
